org.c9.function.bioinformatics.query_uni.name: query_uniprot
org.c9.function.bioinformatics.query_uni.description: Query UniProt to retrieve amino acid sequence by protein name or ID.

inputs.name: protein_name_or_id
inputs.description: Name or UniProt ID of the protein to query.

outputs.description: Amino acid sequence in FASTA format.
